title: 795: MICHAEL SAYLOR FORSEE'S BITCOIN REACHING $6 MILLION, SAYS IT'S 'UNSTOPPABLE' AND WILL REPLACE GOLD!!
description:
The Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor expects the Bitcoin price to reach $6 million per BTC, noting that it is “unstoppable” and will replace gold.

The executive personally owns 17,732 Bitcoin while his company is HODL'ing 122,478 BTC. In November, Saylor said that bitcoin was “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
